entities.name: venomous tentacula seeds
entities.description: The substance needed for the Skiving Snackboxes, described as a Class C Non-Tradeable Substance.

entities.name: skiving snackboxes
entities.description: The object that requires the Venomous Tentacula seeds, mentioned as needing them for some purpose.

entities.name: class c non-tradeable substance
entities.description: A classification given to the Venomous Tentacula seeds, indicating they are difficult to obtain.

entities.name: ten galleons
entities.description: The amount of money that Mundungus is asking for the Venomous Tentacula seeds.

entities.name: dung
entities.description: Mundungus, a person who is trying to sell the Venomous Tentacula seeds.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: A person who is trying to sell the Venomous Tentacula seeds, also referred to as 'Dung'.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, mentioned in conversation with Mundungus.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, mentioned as warning his friends about a potential threat.

entities.name: prefect ron
entities.description: A position held by Ron Weasley, mentioned as being the focus of attention from their mother.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A person who is a potential threat to Harry and his friends, mentioned as possibly having an eye on them.

relationships.description: Harry is in conversation with Fred about Mundungus's price for the Venomous Tentacula seeds.
Harry and his friends are trying to buy the Venomous Tentacula seeds from Mundungus, but he is being difficult about the price.
Fred is in conversation with Harry about Mundungus's price for the Venomous Tentacula seeds.
Mundungus is trying to sell the Venomous Tentacula seeds to Fred, but he is being difficult about the price.
Harry warns his friends that Moody could be a potential threat to them.
